simulator.name: Cache Simulator - Computer Architecture Teaching Tool

cache_configuration.label: Cache Size (bytes)
cache_configuration.description: Total capacity of the cache in bytes.

cache_configuration.label: Block Size (bytes)
cache_configuration.description: Size of each cache block (cache line) in bytes.

cache_configuration.label: Associativity
cache_configuration.description: Determines the mapping between memory blocks and cache sets.

cache_configuration.label: Replacement Policy
cache_configuration.description: Policy used to choose which cache line to evict on a miss.

power_consumption_parameters.label: Static Power per KB (mW/KB)
power_consumption_parameters.description: Leakage/static power associated with each KB of cache.

power_consumption_parameters.label: Dynamic Read Power (mW/access)
power_consumption_parameters.description: Dynamic power consumed for each read access to the cache.

power_consumption_parameters.label: Dynamic Write Power (mW/access)
power_consumption_parameters.description: Dynamic power consumed for each write access to the cache.

power_consumption_parameters.label: Miss Penalty Power (mW/miss)
power_consumption_parameters.description: Additional power cost associated with each cache miss (e.g., going to main memory).

power_consumption_parameters.label: Operating Voltage (V)
power_consumption_parameters.description: Supply voltage at which the cache and CPU operate.

memory_access_sequence.label: Input Memory Addresses
memory_access_sequence.description: Memory addresses to be accessed; one hexadecimal address per line.

memory_access_sequence.label: Access Type
memory_access_sequence.description: Determines whether the access sequence consists of only reads, only writes, or a mix.

timing_and_frequency.label: Clock Frequency (MHz)
timing_and_frequency.description: Processor or core clock frequency used for timing calculations.

timing_and_frequency.label: Frequency Scaling Mode
timing_and_frequency.description: Whether the clock frequency stays constant or can change during the simulation.

controls.label: Run Simulation
controls.description: Executes the cache simulation using the current configuration and memory access sequence.

controls.label: Reset
controls.description: Resets all parameters and clears any previous results.

controls.label: Load Example Data
controls.description: Loads a predefined memory access trace and configuration example.

results_section.label: Simulation Results
results_section.description: Container where the simulator displays results after running.

metrics.label: Cache Hits
metrics.description: Number of memory accesses that were served from the cache.

metrics.label: Cache Misses
metrics.description: Number of memory accesses that missed in the cache and required lower-level memory access.

metrics.label: Hit Rate
metrics.description: Fraction of accesses that hit in the cache.

metrics.label: Miss Rate
metrics.description: Fraction of accesses that miss in the cache.

metrics.label: Total Accesses
metrics.description: Total number of memory operations performed in the trace.

metrics.label: Total Energy
metrics.description: Total energy consumption computed from static and dynamic power parameters and timing.

metrics.label: Average Power
metrics.description: Average power during the simulated execution window.

metrics.label: Execution Time
metrics.description: Estimated time to execute the memory access sequence given clock frequency and miss penalties.
